reviews.text: I am just back from a weekend stay in the Helm, we were a large group of 18 and we all had the most fantastic weekend away in Westport. From out initial booking, the contact and communication with Vinny, Shane and Neville was excellent, all our queries were answered without hesitation. The warm welcome we received from the friendly staff in the Helm was unbelievable, they went over and beyond for us. We enjoyed a great night in the pub on the Friday night which had live music. The apartments were perfect, very clean and spacious. The breakfast on both mornings was fantastic. We also ate in the restaurant on the Saturday night, and the food was gorgeous and the service was excellent. The Helm really is a real gem, and all members of our group expressed that they will definitely all return.
reviews.title: Fantastic Stay in the Helm

reviews.text: This is our second time staying.
reviews.title: very welcoming, great food

reviews.text: We stayed for one night at The Helm over the bar in one of their apartments.
reviews.title: Fabulous Place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff were really friendly and welcoming.
reviews.title: fine

reviews.text: Apartment was really clean and wll equipped.
reviews.title: Fantastic food and service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just back from Westport and had a brillant time, we cannot praise the owners & staff enough at The Helm. The food was the best we had in Westport and the staff went out of their way to ensure we had a lovely time.
reviews.title: Best Restaurant & Bar

reviews.text: Would highly recommend The Helm. To the Owners & Staff you should be proud of yourselves.
reviews.title: Comfortable and very friendly

reviews.text: Shane & Marion from Cork
reviews.title: Quality of Food and Service Excellent

reviews.text: Great place to stay if you want to go for the self-catering option. We stayed upstairs in the apartments which had everything we needed for the stay. Plus you can get a really nice breakfast for only a little extra. The staff were really friendly too. A little out of the main town centre so you will need a taxi at night but at least there is no noise.
reviews.title: Very friendly,Excellent grub

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Have just got back from a very pleasant visit to Westport. Westport is our favourite destination for a weekend away. We had our meal on Saturday evening in the Helm. We were late making a reservation and asked for a table for 3 for 7.30pm. They were fully booked out for the evening but Shane organised a table for us for 6pm and had no problem in fitting in an extra as short notice. The meal as usual was superb with varied dishes at the table which included chicken, fish and goujons and all were cooked to perfection. The staff are always so pleasant and Shane really knows how to look after the customers. Nothing seems to be too much trouble. We will be back again in the not too distant future.
reviews.title: Off the beaten path

reviews.text: The apartment was clean and large enough for 5 people to stay comfortably. The facilities were great for cooking breakfast and the odd dinner. The welcome pack of food was a nice surprise. The bedroom over the pub was a bit loud at night, and the water and ventilation systems were quite noisy, so bring earplugs. Parking right out front, and a great pub below. Comfortable beds...
reviews.title: Average accomodation at an excellent price

reviews.text: I Have just come back from a stay at the Helm the staff were very good we got a drink on the house when we arrived and the shown to our appartment which was great and had everything we needed we also had dinner and lunch in the helm the food and service was fantastic I would have no problem to pass the helm onto friends and family as i know it will be the same great service that they will get.......
reviews.title: First Stay at the Helm

reviews.text: We stayed at The Helm in their appartments at Cinnamon Wharf in Westport. The appartments were extremely clean and well supplied with the basics needed for our stay. A lovely surprise was the welcome pack that was there for us on our arrival....Everything we needed to settle in and relax.
reviews.title: Excellent self Catering accomadation, Food and Friendly service and welcome

reviews.text: The staff at The Helm were always extremely obliging and made our stay very pleasant.
reviews.title: great place to stay

reviews.text: We enjoyed great food there too with a varied menu to suit all tastes!
reviews.title: staff, food,accomadation just amazing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked a one bedroom apartment but were actually given a two bedroom. Always a bonus. A lovely view over the water. A gorgeous breakfast next morning. Really enjoyed our stay. Only small complaint is tv reception but that is not the fault of the hotel.
reviews.title: Great spacious apartment.

reviews.text: We stayed 5 nights at The Helm on a bed & breakfast basis. The accommodation was a 2 bed apartment in a separate block 100yards from the main restaurant & bar. They were spacious & clean with plenty of room, and were perfect for our stay considering the cost.
reviews.title: Fantastic views, food & hospitality

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The attentiveness and service of all staff was amazing, nothing was too much which made out stay superb.
reviews.title: Excellent value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food at The Helm restaurant was fantastic, top class and there was not one grumble about any of the food we had.
reviews.title: " great place to stay "

reviews.text: Would definitely recommend this place and will be returning in the future.
reviews.title: enjoyable
